history.proof: intros a b nZ1 nZ2. unfold divTerm. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) gb := fun H' : mon n * bool => let (_, b) := H' in b : mon n * bool -> bool gm := fun H' : mon n * bool => let (m, _) := H' in m : mon n * bool -> mon n a, b : Term A n nZ1, nZ2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b Unable to unify "(let (b2, c2) := a in fun H' : Term A n => let (b3, c3) as p return (~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) p -> Term A n) := H' in fun nZb3 : ~ eqA b3 A0 => (divA b2 b3 nZb3, div_mon n c2 c3)) b nZ2" with "(let (b2, c2) := a in fun H' : Term A n => let (b3, c3) as p return (~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) p -> Term A n) := H' in fun nZb3 : ~ eqA b3 A0 => (divA b2 b3 nZb3, div_mon n c2 c3)) b nZ1".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
gb: mon n * bool -> bool
gm: mon n * bool -> mon n

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (nZ1 nZ2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b), divTerm a (b:=b) nZ1 = divTerm a (b:=b) nZ2

Premises:
zeroP : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
divTerm : Term A n -> forall b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> Term A n
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
A_sep : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0

nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
mk_clean : forall a b : mon n, {c : mon n * bool | c = div_mon_clean n a b}
divTerm_on_eqT_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) (T1 A1 n)
zeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
nzeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
divA_nZ : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> forall nZa : ~ eqA a A0, ~ eqA (divA b a nZa) A0

plusA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c0 d)
multA_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a)
invA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b)

divA_A1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a : A) (nZa : ~ eqA a A0), eqA (divA a a nZa) A1
multA_invA_com_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA (invA a) b) (invA (multA a b))
eqTerm_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, symmetric (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
divTerm_dec : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)}
multA_dist_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA (multA c0 a) (multA c0 b)) (multA c0 (plusA a b))
zeroP_invTerm_zeroP : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a)
divA_invA_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZib : ~ eqA (invA b) A0), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb))
divA_A0_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a : A) (nZa : ~ eqA a A0), eqA (divA A0 a nZa) A0
divA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 d : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZd : ~ eqA d A0), eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c0 d nZd)
divA_multA_comp_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA a (divA b c nZc))
nZero_invTerm_nZero : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a)
invTerm_invol : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a))
divA_multA_comp_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c0 A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c0 nZc) (multA (divA a c0 nZc) b)
divTerm_on_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
divTerm_on_plusM_minusM : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a = mult_mon n (div_mon n (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b)) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)

divTerm_nZ : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb)
div_mon_clean : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d * bool
eqA_ref : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> reflexive A eqA
eqA_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> symmetric A eqA
eqA_trans : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> transitive A eqA
divTerm_eqT : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> forall nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc) c)
divTerm_ppcr : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=b) nZb) b)
plus_minus_le : forall a b : nat, a - b + b = a -> b <= a
eqTerm : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop

unfold divTerm.
